page.title: 04WETHERBY - DAVID'S WEEKEND 2
page.content:
Sunday
There was going to be a barbecue yesterday, but it was called off for another week. The sun was shining and nothing was going to stop this one. Woke up, had breakfast and got ready for the barbecue. 12 noon. We were off! Got my food, bought a drink and a cake and went to have a look round the stalls. It was 2 p.m. when we arrived back home. I carried on with my Airfix model, then I played on the computer. 7 p.m....tea time! I was very full after the barbecue so I didn't have very much. 9 p.m. My brother and I had a pillow fight and then we were ready for bed. I went to sleep. Well, I tried to!
